topics.description: This field can be used to a additional Information regarding the topic

text: Inconsistent and disintegrated data dictionaries
Granularity of data becoming important
Limited ability to run simulations and do stress testing
No clear mapping of current reporting data models to regulations
No clear basis for building organization wide data dictionaries
Limited ability to run simulations and do stress testing
EY’s Logical Data Model on BIRD available in SAP PowerDesigner allows banks to get a clear overview of BIRD’s cubes and to efficiently transform the BIRD structure into physical database
Banks should take more focus on how to build and structure their future data models to enable clear data taxonomies and dictionaries and to prepare the input oriented regulatory reporting using BIRD.

questions.description: “The initiative BIRD aims to foster cooperation of regulatory reporting thus alleviating the reporting burden for  banks and improving the reported data quality.”
questions.text: What have you planned to manage different granularity levels for different regulatory requirements?

actions.text: Collect Data on the most granular levels

topics.description: Business Analytics and Information Technology (BAIT) covers information technology, data analysis and decision support, which are essential components of the modern enterprise.

text: Lack of transparency in regulatory expectations regarding the secure design of IT-systems and related processes
Rising importance of IT-Governance and information security
IT-Strategy not aligned with Business Strategy
Insufficient and outdated authorization management
Incomplete IT-Governance (e.g. outsourcing activities)
Inadequate inclusion of IT risks
EY’s Logical Data Model on BIRD available in SAP PowerDesigner allows banks to get a clear overview of BIRD’s cubes and to efficiently transform the BIRD structure into physical database
EY delivers the whole value-added chain beginning from consulting of IT-landscape conceptions to the final IT-audit of your environment

questions.text: What is your biggest security concern and what are your future security actions to address the related risks?

actions.text: Loss of data; Invest in cyber security

questions.description: This field can be used to a additional Information regarding the question
questions.text: Information security management: How do you assure that your Information security policy is properly communicated within the institute?

actions.text: Develop regular information security workshops and trainings

questions.description: This field can be used to a additional Information regarding the question
questions.text: User access management: Do you plan projects with regard that proper and auditable assignment / modification / deletion of authorizations/user accesses management takes place within the company?

actions.text: Renew user authorizations and access settings

questions.text: IT projects: Are the IT projects adequately controlled in terms of their duration, resource consumption and quality? How do you improve your current controlling activities?

actions.text: Projekt Controlling 2.0 - Set up an encompassing management controlling tool

topics.description: AnaCredit (Analytical credit Dataset) is a project to set up a dataset containing detailed information on individual bank loans in the euro area, harmonised across all Member States.

text: Need for more detailed statistics covering all Euro area member states, more comparability
Monitoring developments in different economic sectors
Governance in terms of macro prudential supervision
Master data management: Granularity equires high quality data
Data processing: Higher data volumes to be processed in shorter time
Organizational processes: Need for development of new data capture
The EY-logical data model on AnaCredit is available in SAP PowerDesigner and enables: An overview of data in the form of a data modelling and the creation of a corporate repository and glossary
Data catalogue for loans within the ECB Reporting Framework
Cost allocation and reduction with data collection, -QA, -exchange
Elimination of data gaps
Establishment of organizational structures

actions.text: Set up a Financial Services Data Platform (FSDP)
